LanguageData.SuccessCalm: {1} has been successfully calmed down by {0}.
LanguageData.AggroFailCalm: {0} is being attacked after failing to calm {1} down
LanguageData.CM2: Don't worry, I've got your back.
LanguageData.CM3: Just hold on with me, I'll be with you all the way.
LanguageData.CM4: It's just a table, we will be fine.
LanguageData.CM6: I'm here for you, tell me what's bothering you - I'm listening.
LanguageData.CM8: Take deep breaths, you can do it. Relax...
LanguageData.CM9: I know what you're going through, I'd really like to help...
LanguageData.CM14: It's like a storm, it's just temporary.
LanguageData.CM16: You're safe, I'm here for you.
LanguageData.CM17: I'm sorry you're going through that.
LanguageData.CM18: You're not on your own, we are all here for you.
LanguageData.CM20: You can vent to me, I'll listen.
LanguageData.CM21: We have a great recreation room, how about we play some chess together?
